o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_Check_NonPKAttributeHasAggregateSpecified
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Creator: BuwaldaN
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:HelpMessage: This check ensures that an aggregate is specified for all attribute(s) that are not part of the primary key.
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:OutputMessage: The following objects do not pass custom check:
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:CheckScript: Function %Check%(obj) %Check% = True Dim strAggregate : strAggregate = obj.GetExtendedAttribute("mdde_Aggregate") If obj.Feature.PrimaryIdentifier = False And Len(strAggregate) = 0 Then WriteError( " Mapping: " & obj.ClassifierMap.DisplayName & " Attribute: " & obj.Feature.DisplayName & "' for aggregate business rule: " & obj.ClassifierMap.Classifier.DisplayName & "'" & " has no Aggregate method specified.") %Check% = False End if End Function
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:AutoFixScrpt:
Function %Fix%(obj, outmsg) ' Implement your automatic correction on <obj> here ' filling <outmsg> as you wish ' and return True if successful.
outmsg = "Automatic correction not implemented"
%Fix% = False End Function
